activities:
Fulfillment Xcellence Inc is a project management company that provides services to companies, our customers, to manage customer information on their behalf. Fulfillment Xcellence Inc does not own or control any of the information it processes on behalf of Fulfillment Xcellence Inc's customers.  All such information is owned and/or controlled by Fulfillment Xcellence's customers.  These companies
direct Fulfillment Xcellence Inc. via written instructions on how to process their data to meet their objectives.
